author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the phase-II HLT E/gamma debug producer by introducing a new class EgammaHLTPhaseIIExtraProducer which handles the Phase-II specific things such as HGCAL and L1 tracks so it doesnt have to be exposed to the standard EgammaHLTExtraProducer.

It also introduces a new track trigger dataformat, L1TrackTruthPair which makes it easier to deal with the L1 tracks and truth matching, particularly in FWLite

#### PR validation:

Used extensively for E/g HLT phase-II development. Test shows this produces the expected output

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32911
title: Extending E/gamma HLT Debug to phaseII and adding rec-hit counts: 11_1_X
